thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: As Prospects for Iran Nuclear Deal Dim, Outlook for Israeli Leader Brightens

author: Dov Lieber
title: As Prospects for Iran Nuclear Deal Dim, Outlook for Israeli Leader Brightens
text:
Two weeks ago, Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu faced spiraling police corruption probes that were entangling his wife, polarizing Israelis and threatening his hold on the country’s top office. President Donald Trump’s move to withdraw from the Iran nuclear deal—long opposed by Mr. Netanyahu—has dramatically brightened the Israeli leader’s political outlook.
Israelis have rallied beyond Mr. Netanyahu’s right-wing backers to support his policies on Iran, a shift that has scrambled the nation’s politics and boosted... RELATED VIDEO Will Trump's Iran Bet Pay Off? After President Donald Trump's big gamble to pull the U.S. out of the Iran nuclear deal, the focus now shifts to Tehran, the Iranian people and America's allies. Gerald F. Seib explains the high stakes. Photo: Getty
